trans-unit.source: Contains data associated with a workflow change that occurs during the execution of a workflow instance.
trans-unit.target: Contém os dados associados a uma alteração de fluxo de trabalho que ocorre durante a execução de uma instância de fluxo de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] When a workflow change occurs during the execution of a workflow instance and a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile> associated with the workflow instance includes a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackPoint> configured for the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent> event, the runtime tracking infrastructure sets <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingRecord.EventArgs%2A> to TrackingWorkflowChangedEventArgs in the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingRecord> that it sends to the tracking service.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]Quando uma alteração de fluxo de trabalho ocorre durante a execução de uma instância de fluxo de trabalho e um <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile>associados com o fluxo de trabalho inclui instância um <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackPoint>configurado para o <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent>evento, o tempo de execução conjuntos de infraestrutura de controlo <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingRecord.EventArgs%2A>para TrackingWorkflowChangedEventArgs no <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingRecord>que envia para o serviço de controlo.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingRecord> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingRecord.EventArgs%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackPoint> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > TrackingWorkflowChangedEventArgs is used only by the runtime tracking service to pass information in a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingRecord>.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > TrackingWorkflowChangedEventArgs é utilizada apenas por tempo de execução do serviço de controlo para passar informações <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingRecord>.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingRecord>

trans-unit.source: Gets the changes that occurred to the workflow instance.
trans-unit.target: Obtém as alterações que ocorreram para a instância de fluxo de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: A list of <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.WorkflowChangeAction"></xref> objects that specify the changes that occurred to the workflow instance.
trans-unit.target: Uma lista de <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.WorkflowChangeAction"> </xref> objetos que especificar as alterações que ocorreram para a instância de fluxo de trabalho.
Obtém a definição de fluxo de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"></xref> that represents the root activity of the workflow instance.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"> </xref> que representa a atividade raiz da instância do fluxo de trabalho.
